comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Caroline King Duer (1865- ), writer and editor, sister of Alice Duer Miller (1874-1942), also a writer.  They were daughters of New York City banker James Gore King Duer.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I added her to Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caroline_King_Duer Caroline King Duer (1867 - January 23, 1956) was an editor at Vogue magazine and writer.
